about_the_game:
With this add-on, you'll be able to set the game to run AI vs AI for as long as you want to watch! All day, all night, 24 hours a day is no problem! This DLC makes this game a fantastic screen saver!

When you own this DLC, from the main welcome screen...

Press F11 to go into the auto AI mode. You'll see it turned on in the upper left corner of the screen. The game will select the characters, the background, the game time, and the game mode all automatically and after a game is over, it will automatically go back to the welcome screen and choose everything again and begin a new game!

Press F12 from the welcome screen to stop the AI mode so that you can play the game yourself!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
